# Field degree = 3
k:=1:
l:=1:
m:=0:
n:=2:
p:=0:
q:=3:
R := I*z + z^k*w^l + (a1+b1*I)*z^m*w^n + (a2+b2*I)*z^p*w^q:

# Computing Lyapunov constants...
L2:=2/3*a2*a1 + (2/3*b2 + 4/3)*b1:
L3:=31/12*a1^2*b1 + 31/12*b1^3 - 11/4*b1^2*a2 + 11/4*a1*b1*b2 - 11/2*a1*b1 - 19/12*b1 - 9/4*a2:
L4:=40810/29791*b1^2*a2^3 + 81620/29791*b1^2*a2*b2^2 - 40810/29791*a1*b1*b2^3 - 163240/29791*b1^2*a2*b2 + 244860/29791*a1*b1*b2^2 - 59360/2883*b1^3 - 260854/14415*b1^2*a2 + 1984138/148955*b1*a2^2 + 33390/29791*a2^3 + 740674/446865*a1*b1*b2 + 1984138/148955*b1*b2^2 + 33390/29791*a2*b2^2 + 567616/446865*a1*b1 - 281960/89373*b1*b2 - 133560/29791*a2*b2 - 567616/148955*b1 - 567616/446865*a2:
L5:=-5808552538763/74060689500*b1^2*a2 + 1313581711/199087875*b1*a2^2 + 394382691/9831500*a2^3 + 5808552538763/74060689500*a1*b1*b2 + 1313581711/199087875*b1*b2^2 + 394382691/9831500*a2*b2^2 + 9363373208/529004925*a1*b1 - 4574298047/44241750*b1*b2 - 9363373208/176334975*b1 - 9363373208/529004925*a2:
L6:=131047892061546017095493541634906458052159360795985216410646298292904351486071467/1848406085757602160509822383798414222720176645475348659213943983153773783549000*a2*b2^2 + 3258899407813308925721634746842990288372627599902727149188618716938820856372256/231050760719700270063727797974801777840022080684418582401742997894221722943625*a1*b1 + 11665257921886987870999086779010472844434877713204152280245844677647241313276151/1155253803598501350318638989874008889200110403422092912008714989471108614718125*b1*b2 - 28008070860215086891440743168144132121494383542140568354558780417811794021273279/2310507607197002700637277979748017778400220806844185824017429978942217229436250*a2*b2 - 9776698223439926777164904240528970865117882799708181447565856150816462569116768/231050760719700270063727797974801777840022080684418582401742997894221722943625*b1 - 3258899407813308925721634746842990288372627599902727149188618716938820856372256/231050760719700270063727797974801777840022080684418582401742997894221722943625*a2:
L7:=0: #reduced
L8:=0: #reduced
L9:=0: #reduced
L10:=0: #reduced
L11:=0: #reduced

# Computing reversible center conditions

c0:=x + 1:
c1:=a1*x^3 + (I)*b1*x^3 + a1 + (-I)*b1:
c2:=a2*x^4 + (I)*b2*x^4 + a2 + (-I)*b2:
